title: Fox has no Heart - Novel Updates
tags: Ancient Times   Apathetic Protagonist   Appearance Different from Actual Age   Cold Protagonist   Death of Loved Ones   Dense Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Fox Spirits   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Non-humanoid Protagonist   Oneshot   Pregnancy   Short Story   Unconditional Love   Unrequited Love
author: 黑猫州长
description:
'I'm a fox not a human.'

'I know, you're a fox.'

'Then, why do you follow me?'

'I like you.'

'But I won't like you. I don't have a heart.'

'Then, I will give you my heart.'>
